meta.title: Sen - PvZ2 Modding Tool
meta.description: Sen is what you need! The all-in-one tool for modding PvZ2. It's easy to use and has a lot of features to help you create your own mods.

about.title: About Sen - PvZ2 Modding Tool
about.description: Learn about Sen, the all-in-one PvZ2 modding tool. Discover our features, supported modules, technology stack, and platform availability.
about.keywords: Sen about, PvZ2 modding, modding tool features, game modding, open source

download.title: Download Sen | Sen - PvZ2 Modding Tool
download.description: Download Sen for Windows, Android, and other platforms. Get the latest version and start modding PvZ2 today!

nav.welcomeDescription: Welcome to Sen - PvZ2 Modding Tool
nav.aboutDescription: Learn more about Sen and its features

hero.tagline: Build your PvZ2 mod faster with Sen!
hero.description: Sen is what you need! The all-in-one tool for modding PvZ2. It's easy to use and has a lot of features to help you create your own mods.

about.subtitle: The ultimate modding tool for PvZ2

about.title: About
about.description: Sen.Environment is a modding tool for PvZ2, designed to simplify the modding process and enhance the gaming experience.

platform.title: Platform Support
platform.windowsDescription: Sen.Environment is fully compatible with Windows, providing a seamless experience for modding PvZ2.
platform.androidDescription: Sen.Environment is also available on Android, allowing users to enjoy modding on their preferred platform.

modules.title: Modules
modules.kernelDescription: The core of the Sen.Environment, providing essential functionalities and low-level operations.
modules.shellDescription: A user interface for command processing and interaction with the kernel.
modules.scriptDescription: A module for automation and scripting capabilities, allowing users to create custom scripts.
modules.moddingDescription: A module for game file modifications and management, enabling users to create and manage mods easily.

tech.title: Technologies Used
tech.mesonDescription: Meson is a build system that is designed to be fast and user-friendly. It is used to build the Sen project.
tech.flutterDescription: Flutter is a UI toolkit that is used to build the Sen project. It allows you to build beautiful and responsive user interfaces for mobile, web, and desktop applications.

download.title: Download Sen
download.subtitle: Choose the version that works best for your device

systemRequirements.title: System Requirements
systemRequirements.info: For the best experience, we recommend using the latest version of your operating system.

step1.title: Download the installer
step1.description: Click the download button for your platform above.

step2.title: Run the installer
step2.description: Double-click the downloaded file to start the installation process.

step3.title: Follow the setup wizard
step3.description: Accept the license agreement and choose your installation options.

step4.title: Launch Sen
step4.description: Once installed, you can launch Sen from your desktop or start menu.
